name: Istituto Europeo di Scienze Forensi e Biomediche
goal: The Institute provides courses at any level and at affordable costs. It also provides consultancies by all its professors nd consultants which offer services in law, medicine etc... according to the minimum feees and with no profit aim. All the professors are working actively in their fields of competence and carry out activities of research working with the most important Universities in Europe.
interests: Borders and Security, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: The Institute welcomes invitations from other European Organisations with whom it collaborates and take part with to calls for the protection of the environment, for the protection of rights of men and animals.
